verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%> unto Philemon <S%G5371><s%> our dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fellow laborer, <S%G4904><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to our beloved <S%G27><s%> Apphia, <S%G682><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Archippus <S%G751><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellow soldier, <S%G4961><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of thee <S%G4675><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers, <S%G4335><s%>

Hearing <S%G191><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast <S%G2192><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints; <S%G40><s%>

That <S%G3704><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> communication <S%G2842><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> effectual <S%G1756><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> joy <S%G5485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> are refreshed <S%G373><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> though I might be <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> bold <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to enjoin <S%G2004><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> that which is convenient, <S%G433><s%>

Yet for love's sake <S%G1223><s%> <S%G26><s%> I rather <S%G3123><s%> beseech <S%G3870><s%> thee, being <S%G5607><s%> such a one <S%G5108><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> the aged, <S%G4246><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I beseech <S%G3870><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> Onesimus, <S%G3682><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have begotten <S%G1080><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bonds: <S%G1199><s%>

Which <S%G3588><s%> in time past <S%G4218><s%> was to thee <S%G4671><s%> unprofitable, <S%G890><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> profitable <S%G2173><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to me: <S%G1698><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent again: <S%G375><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G1161><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> that is, <S%G5123><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> bowels: <S%G4698><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> would <S%G1014><s%> have retained <S%G2722><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> me, <S%G1683><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in thy stead <S%G5228><s%> <S%G4675><s%> he might have ministered unto <S%G1247><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bonds <S%G1199><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> mind <S%G1106><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> nothing; <S%G3762><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> benefit <S%G18><s%> should not <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G5600><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> necessity, <S%G318><s%> but <S%G235><s%> willingly. <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1595><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> perhaps <S%G5029><s%> he therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> departed <S%G5563><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a season, <S%G5610><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest receive <S%G568><s%> him <S%G846><s%> forever; <S%G166><s%>

Not now <S%G3765><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a servant, <S%G1401><s%> but <S%G235><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> a servant, <S%G1401><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> to me, <S%G1698><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> how much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord? <S%G2962><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> thou count <S%G2192><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> a partner, <S%G2844><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> him <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> myself. <S%G1691><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> he hath wronged <S%G91><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> oweth <S%G3784><s%> thee aught, <S%G5100><s%> put that on mine account; <S%G1677><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1698><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> have written <S%G1125><s%> it with mine own <S%G1699><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will repay <S%G661><s%> it: albeit <S%G2443><s%> I do not <S%G3361><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> thou owest <S%G4359><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> thine own self <S%G4572><s%> besides.

Yea, <S%G3483><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> let me <S%G1473><s%> have joy <S%G3685><s%> of thee <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> refresh <S%G373><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou wilt also <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> more than <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I say. <S%G3004><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> withal <S%G260><s%> prepare <S%G2090><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a lodging: <S%G3578><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> prayers <S%G4335><s%> I shall be given <S%G5483><s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>
There salute <S%G782><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow prisoner <S%G4869><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>
Mark, <S%G3138><s%> Aristarchus, <S%G708><s%> Demas, <S%G1214><s%> Luke, <S%G3065><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow laborers. <S%G4904><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
